comments.body: Mods please approve this post else I will have to live worried like this untill I am able to find someone whom I can ask about the admission process üôè
There are posts about pessat counselling but now it's abolished and there isn't detailed post for jee counselling.

¬†i think they will release a rank list based off your jee mains crl, after which you choose your preferred branch/campus through the jee main admission preferrence list & then they will conduct counselling (in person). there might be some more steps to it, that i'm not sure of, but this is the gist of it.
When does the process start typically?
Is whole counselling process which is done offline completed in a day?

Counselling starts around June, there were 2 rounds this year. Each round happens in 1 day, 1st happened in June, 2nd took place in July. You get called based on your pesu-jee rank, like for us it was rank 1-1500 at 8am, 1500-3000 10am, 3000-5000 2pm type thing, and the offline counselling finishes in a day
around may june ig? not sure really but it starts after advance is over ig
yes. you select ur branch n campus based on availability and pay as welll. there will be 2 rounds of counselling usually but i'm not sure if the ranks drop by a lot in the 2nd round

If I am outside Karnataka student then can I select offline counselling or do I have to compulsarily go in online counseling if there is any? And when does the application process start typically? Is the counselling for both the campuses done at the rr campus?

Yes, I believe you can select offline counselling. Not sure, but I think that is default; you have to choose if going online.
Application for counselling? May end, I think.
Yes, counselling for both campuses is done at RR.
